about_the_game:
Try your hand at grave digging and see if you have what it takes to rob the dead and survive! The demo includes the tutorial graveyard and 3 other full graveyards from the retail version. If you like it, buy the full game to get:

All 18 Dickensian graveyards
All 5 ghost types with individual AI
1 unlockable bonus graveyard

content_descriptors.notes: Favourable depiction of the desecration of graves.

detailed_description:
Try your hand at grave digging and see if you have what it takes to rob the dead and survive! The demo includes the tutorial graveyard and 3 other full graveyards from the retail version. If you like it, buy the full game to get:

All 18 Dickensian graveyards
All 5 ghost types with individual AI
1 unlockable bonus graveyard

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or above with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: The Grave Digger Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or above
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or above with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
